business_details.Business: Accused is absent. Issue N.B.W.A against the accused is returned with report. I/O has submitted the report that accused Pradip Sutradhar Passed away on dated 05.06.2019. He also produced a photocopy of death certificated and gaonburh a certificate of the accused. Seen the report and certificates, Considering above the case of accused Pradip Sutradhar is abated.
